item.title: Reference genome
item.description: A brief introduction for reference genome in FASTA and other format.

item.title: JupyterLab Keyboard Shortcut
item.description: Shortcut ESC takes users into command mode view ENTER takes users into cell mode view M change current cell to a markdown cell Y change current cell to a code cell R change current cell to a raw cell. A inserts a cell above the currently selected cell.

item.title: Create a website with R Markdown and Hugo
item.description: In this tutorial I will show you how to create your own website with R package blogdown, Hugo, Github, and Netlify in 1h without any background.

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: Hello world! This is the first blog for my personal website.
